text: The legislature of the U.S. state of Colorado has convened many times since statehood became effective on August 1, 1876. ==Legislatures== * 1st Colorado General Assembly, 1876 * 2nd Colorado General Assembly, 1879 * 67th Colorado General Assembly, 2009-2010 * 68th Colorado General Assembly, January 12, 2011 – January 9, 2013 * 70th Colorado General Assembly, 2015-2016 * 71st Colorado General Assembly, 2017-2018 ** 2017: January 11-May 10, October 2–3, 2017 ** 2018: January 10-May 9, 2018 * 72nd Colorado General Assembly, 2019- ** January 4-May 3, 2019 ==See also== * Legislative staff in Colorado * List of governors of Colorado * History of Colorado ==References== ==Further reading== * * ==External links== * Colorado General Assembly. Bills, Resolutions, & Memorials, 2016–present * Colorado General Assembly. Legislative sessions, 1997-2015 * Colorado General Assembly. Colorado Legislators Past and Present * Colorado State Archives. Legislative Records * * Legislatures Legislature Colorado Category:Colorado politics-related lists colorado
title: List of Colorado state legislatures
